name: Send daily Google Ads performance stats to Slack
description: Streamline your ad campaign monitoring by automatically sending daily performance stats from Google Ads to your preferred Slack channel or team member. Customize the Google Ads Query Language (GAQL) in the third module to fetch specific metrics, and adjust the text aggregator for any new data points. Set to run at 8 AM daily, you can easily reschedule it to fit your workflow by clicking the clock icon on the setup module. Please note to deactivate ad blockers for optimal app performance.
